snippet.title: GOROGOA | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Gorogoa is an elegant evolution of the puzzle genre, told through a beautifully hand-drawn story designed and illustrated by Jason Roberts. Now available on Steam, GOG, Nintendo Switch and the App Store: http://gorogoa.com

Steam: http://bit.ly/GorogoaSteam
GOG: http://bit.ly/GorogoaGOG
Switch: http://bit.ly/GorogoaSwitch
App Store: http://apple.co/iOSGorogoa

Developed by JASON ROBERTS. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2017
